verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Everyone needs compassion A love that’s never failing Let mercy fall on me Everyone needs forgiveness A kindness of a Savior The hope of nations{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Savior He can move the mountains My God is Mighty to save He is Mighty to save Forever author of salvation He rose and conquered the grave Jesus conquered the grave{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So take me as You find me All my fears and failures Fill my life again I give my life to follow Everything I believe in Now I surrender{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Savior He can move the mountains My God is Mighty to save He is Mighty to save Forever author of salvation He rose and conquered the grave Jesus conquered the grave{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shine your light and let the whole world sing We’re singing for the glory of the risen King…Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Savior He can move the mountains My God is Mighty to save He is Mighty to save Forever author of salvation He rose and conquered the grave Jesus conquered the grave{/lang-eng}
